intro: It's hard to imagine a more haunting text to get from someone who has gone missing than "idk who im with so if I call please answer. I feel in trouble." That was the last text that Paighton sent, to a co-worker, before she went missing. She had gone to the bar with a group of co-workers but allegedly left with two heavy-set,  black males. Her body was found in a shallow grave on January 3rd.
summary: Paighton Houston went missing on December 20, 2019, after allegedly leaving a bar with two males. Her body was found on January 3, 2020.
title: Paighton Houston
